description:
An unorthodox master sniper who can pierce his target with a ricochet round. After being fired from an assassin agency due to his lack of talent in all but marksmanship, Sakamoto acknowledges his skill and welcomes him as a comrade. On the battlefield he has seamless teamwork with his partner, a bird named Piisuke. Simple-minded but loyal to his friends.
Source: Official page
name: Mashimo Heisuke
